titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to extend the pilot program for alternative water source projects.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water pollution control
Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 7/6/2004--Introduced. Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to increase the amount of authorized appropriations for the pilot program for alternative water source projects and extend program authorization through FY 2009.
